title: Game crash after champion select
body: Im in champion select im picking champion and then when starts game i got black screen and i got error message and shows if i got problem message us but i watched all youtube videos and i doing that but nothing helps me so if someone can help here ?? My english sucks my bad :D

replies.body:
It sounds like there's an issue between your PC and the gameservers you're trying to connect to, likely caused by a local network issue or routing problem. Before we take a look into your network routing, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to confirm everything on your local side is configured properly.

Let me know if this caused any sort of change for you.
